name: Jelly Bouncer: addictive arcade game
description:
Jelly Bouncer! Help the jelly bounce around and avoid the obstacle. Start jumping with thissimple, addictive and fun arcade game. Don't let the cute jelly fall! 

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
 Achievements - unlock new levels!
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Jelly Bouncer is completely free to play! Enjoy!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello Jelly lovers! This one is a big one! A lot of new features just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
